author: 0x6c
content: during the call a week or so ago, there was concern (I think from Micah?) about whether or not to ship MEV-boost as a part of the merge. since the clients have already delivered their merge-ready versions, I assume a choice has been made here?

author: ajsutton
content: Even by the time the call happened there were non-censoring relays available so there wasn't really a question of not including support left, mostly just comment on the importance of censorship resistance and some discussion around what the threshold may be to manually slash validators who censor.
